name: Doggernaut
description:
DOGGERNAUT

Oh no! Doggernaut is Out Of Control and going on the fluffiest rampage the 367th Space Quadrant has ever seen!

What's worse is that in their blind puppy rage, Doggernaut is unable to see the spikes threatening certain doom!

Since we can't control Doggernaut, it's up to you, THE ALL-SEEING OMNIPOTENCE, to save the day!

Click on a space to spawn a boulder that'll divert Doggernaut to a different path and hope that The Eternal Space Highway doesn't live up to its name!

All art+sound assets created during the jam.

Font License: https://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&id=OFL
